usa: The Empire State Building opened in New York City.<sup id="cite_ref-119" class="reference">[119]</sup>
india: Bhagat Singh, Rajguru and Sukhdev Martyred
australia: Sir Douglas Mawson charts 4,000 miles of Antarctic coastline and claims 42% of the icy mass for Australia
Death of Dame Nellie Melba aged 69.
argentina: General Agustín Justo declared winner of Presidency following 'patriotic fraud' in election
albania: Zog refused to renew the First Treaty of Tirana despite Italian political and economic pressure.
